cves.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Mavi Yeşil Software Guest Tracking Software allows SQL Injection.This issue affects .  NOTE: The vendor did not inform about the completion of the fixing process within the specified time. The CVE will be updated when new information becomes available.
problemType: CWE-89 Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection')

cves.description: On  open-vsx.org https://open-vsx.org/  it was possible to run an arbitrary build scripts for auto-published extensions because of missing sandboxing of CI job runs.  An attacker who had access to an existing extension could take over the service account of the marketplace. The issue has been fixed on June 24th, 2025 and the vulnerable code present in the publish-extension code repository.
problemType: CWE-913 Improper Control of Dynamically-Managed Code Resources
